summary: Frontend-only mobile responsiveness testing for Servis Pro gas boiler repair website. Tested mobile viewports (320px, 360px, 375px, 414px), hamburger menu, language switching (RU/UZ/ЎЗ), brand carousel, and BAXI brand page.

ui_bugs.issue: On 320px viewport, both CTAs are below the fold (Primary CTA at y=597px, Secondary at y=653px, viewport height=568px)
On 360px viewport, Secondary CTA is below the fold (at y=624px, viewport height=640px)

issues: CTAs not visible above fold - users need to scroll to see call-to-action buttons

action_items: Consider reducing hero section padding/margins on smallest viewports (320px) to ensure CTAs are visible above fold
Alternative: Reduce hero image height further on 320px viewport or adjust hero-content spacing
critical_code_review_comments: Hero section height is correctly limited to 35vh max on mobile (180px actual vs 198px max on 320px)
Mobile menu z-index and positioning work correctly
Language switching works flawlessly - Uzbek Cyrillic (ЎЗ) renders correctly without breaking layout
Brand carousel animation works but makes clicking difficult (expected behavior for infinite scroll)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Mobile responsiveness testing completed. Key findings: 1) CTAs below fold on 320px viewport, 2) All other viewports (360px+) work well, 3) Language switching works perfectly including Uzbek Cyrillic, 4) Hamburger menu functions correctly with language switcher, nav links, and services section, 5) Brand pages load correctly on mobile, 6) Hero image height is within 35vh limit

mocked_apis.telegram_contact_form: MOCKED - form submission is a placeholder
